term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - aminiumyl radical ions
term.title: aminiumyl radical ions

item.text: Radicals cations, R3N.+, derivable from aminium ions, R3NH+ , by removal of a hydrogen atom. Aminiumyl radical ions are, except for H3N.+ , synonymous with the ammoniumyl radical ions. As the term ammonium is well known, ammoniumyl radical ions is the more desirable class name.
